answers.answer: Oh my gosh I'm so sorry to.hear that!! I actually Js give them my pee jug Cos.I have high blood pressure nd doc wants to see if Im.positive on preeclampsia but so far.I am... Its scary. How early are u delivering???

I turn 29 weeks tomorrow,  if it comes back positive im not sure when id deliver. My dr said lets wait to see wats going on then wed talk about it. Kind of ***** its happening now tho because now I cant turn it in till Monday so ill have all weekend to think about it. What about you?
Oh geez... Atleast u need to deliver ur baby wen hes full term which is 37 weeks right???  I'm only 19 weeks...
Oh wow thats early :/ I hope it goes good for you

Studies show that if you absolutely had to deliver now there is a 9 out of 10 chance that your baby will be fine due to all the technology we have now. My friend had to deliver at 24 weeks because of that and yes it was a very hard and long road but the baby is 8 months now and doing great.

question: I was having a really good day enjoying the day with my guy he took me out to lunch did some shopping, and went to our baby apt. But the apt didn't go like I was expecting, evidently im way to dehydrated and then to top it off my blood pressure was really high and they tested it a couple times but it didn't get better.  Now I have to do a urine collection this weekend because shes afraid of me getting preeclampsia,  or she said because I have a history of high blood pressure she said it has to be monitored closely since im in my third trimester and if it doesn't get better I will have to deliver him sooner than expectd. Now im all worried and just bummed out in general
title: just need to vent
